 Example:
    even_odd_count(-12) ==> {1, 1}

#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<string>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
vector<int> even_odd_count(int num){
    vector<int> even_odd_count(num);
    int i=0;
    while(i<num){
        if(i%2==0){
            even_odd_count[i]++;
        }
        i++;
    }
    return even_odd_count;
}

        if(i%2!=0){

        }
        i++;
    }
